intro: Elatostema bijiangense, commonly known as the Bijiang elatostema, is a herbaceous plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes plants commonly known as nettles. The plant features small, opposite leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It produces tiny, greenish-white flowers arranged in clusters. Elatostema bijiangense is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or rocky areas.
